price: 37. Soki atunaki bino yango, bolingaki bozala bapimi, mpe akobimisa boyini na bino.
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
